text: @marklevinshow CNN and this doctor are a disgrace.  Yes the drug has potential side effects.  So do most nearly every drug.  The side effects are well know as the drug has been around for ages.  If it can be given to arthritis and lupus patients why can’t it be given to Covid-19 patients.
